text: The Angola basketball cup is the second most important nationwide annual basketball competition in Angola. In the preliminary stage, six teams contested in a 2-leg head-to-head playoff with the winners joining the remaining five "higher-ranked" teams for the quarter finals, at which stage, the eight teams will compete in a two-leg knock out play-off, followed by a two-leg semifinal. The final will be played in a single match. ==2017 Angola Men's Basketball Cup== ===Preliminary rounds=== {| style="text-align:center; width:40em" |- align="left" bgcolor=#D0E7FF | colspan=4| 29 February 2016 |- | align="right" width=40%|Interclube || 78 : 56 || align=left width=40%| Progresso |- | align="right"|Progresso || : || align=left| Interclube |- align="left" bgcolor=#D0E7FF | colspan=4| 29 February 2016 |- | align="right"|Marinha || 78 : 66 || align=left| Lusíada |- | align="right"| Lusíada || : || align=left| Marinha |- align="left" bgcolor=#D0E7FF | colspan=4| 29 February 2016 |- | align="right"| Sporting do Bié || 75 : 102 || align=left|Vila Clotilde |- | align="right"| Vila Clotilde || : || align=left| Sporting do Bié |} === Final round === === Final === ==2017 Angola Women's Basketball Cup== {| class=wikitable style="text-align:center; width: 1000px; margin:auto" |- !2017 Angola Men's Basketball Cup winner !! 2017 Angola Women's Basketball Cup winner |- |100px Clube Recreativo Desportivo do Libolo 5th title Team roster: Andre Harris, Benvindo Quimbamba, Eduardo Mingas, Elmer Félix, Je'Kel Foster, Jorge Tati, Joseny Joaquim, Manda João, Mílton Barros, Olímpio Cipriano, Roberto Fortes, Valdelício Joaquim. Head Coach: Hugo López ||100px Grupo Desportivo Interclube 6th title Team roster: Angelina Golome, Astrida Vicente, Emanuela Mateus, Felizarda Jorge, Italee Lucas, Luzia Simão, Merciana Fernandes, Nadir Manuel, Nguendula Filipe, Pauline Nsimbo, Rosemira Daniel, Sequoia Holmes Head Coach: Apolinário Paquete |} ==See also== * 2017 Angola Basketball Super Cup * 2016 BIC Basket * 2017 Victorino Cunha Cup ==References== Category:Angola Basketball Cup seasons Cup
